typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT  c.id as Id\n       ,c.VENUE_NAME as LocationName\n       ,c.ADDRESS_1 as LocationAddress1\n       ,c.ADDRESS_2 as LocationAddress2\n       ,c.TOWN as LocationTown\n       ,c.COUNTY as LocationCounty\n       ,c.POSTCODE as LocationPostcode\n       ,c.Latitude as LocationLatitude\n       ,c.Longitude as LocationLongitude                                                 \nFROM c',
	format: 'documentQuery') ~> Venues
source(output(
		Id as string,
		ApiLocationId as string,
		SubRegionName as string,
		Checked as boolean,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Weighting as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CourseRuns
Exists2 exists(negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists3 exists(negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
Venues exists(negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists3
